name.fr: Gestionnaire de mots de passe RoboForm
name.ja: ロボフォームパスワード管理

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: RoboForm Password Manager makes your life easier by remembering passwords and logging you into websites automatically
short.da: RoboForm Password Manager gør dit liv lettere ved at huske passwords og logge dig ind på websteder automatisk
short.de: RoboForm Password Manager erleichtert Ihnen das Leben, indem er sich Passwörter merkt und Sie automatisch bei Websites anmeldet
short.es: RoboForm hace la vida más fácil al recordar automáticamente las contraseñas e iniciar sesión en sitios web
short.fr: RoboForm vous facilite la vie en se souvenant des mots de passe et en se connectant automatiquement aux sites Web
short.it: RoboForm ti semplifica la vita ricordando le password e accedendo automaticamente ai tuoi siti web
short.ja: ロボフォーム のパスワード管理システムは、インターネット ライフを安全かつ簡単にします
short.nl: RoboForm maakt uw leven gemakkelijker door wachtwoorden te onthouden en automatisch in te loggen op websites
short.no: RoboForm gjør livet ditt enklere ved automatisk å huske passord og logge inn på nettsider
short.pl: RoboForm ułatwia Ci życie, zapamiętując hasła i automatycznie logując Cię na stronach internetowych
short.pt_BR: O RoboForm facilita sua vida lembrando senhas e entrando em sites automaticamente
short.ru: RoboForm делает вашу жизнь проще, запоминая ваши пароли и осуществляя автоматический вход на сайты
short.sr: RoboForm menadžer lozinki olakšava vaš život tako što će se sećati lozinki i automatski vas prijaviti na veb lokacije
short.sv: RoboForm gör ditt liv enklare genom att komma ihåg lösenord och logga in på webbplatser automatiskt
short.tr: RoboForm, şifreleri hatırlayarak ve web sitelerinde otomatik olarak oturum açarak hayatınızı kolaylaştırır
short.zh_CN: RoboForm 通过记住密码和自动登录网站让您的生活更轻松、更方便
short.zh_TW: RoboForm 透過記住密碼和自動登入網站讓您的生活更輕鬆、更方便

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and seamless password manager for all your devices.
Want an easier way to log in and securely manage your passwords? Add RoboForm to your browser and log in with just one click.
Get started in seconds. RoboForm will offer to save your passwords as you enter them.

🌎 Works on all devices and browsers
RoboForm works on any browser, not just Chrome. And it works on any device, including iOS and Android.

⏩ One click is better than five
Just one click on a RoboForm Login will take you to the website sign-in page, fill your credentials, and hit the submit button on any device.

✔️ Intuitive and easy to use
Manage your passwords from our intuitive and easy to use browser extension and web editor.

🔒 Zero-knowledge security
Only you can access your data. Your passwords are encrypted with your own secret key—the RoboForm Master Password which you create. We use AES256 bit encryption with PBKDF2 SHA256. All encryption/decryption happens on your local device. Your Master Password is never transmitted to our server.

⬆️ Import from Chrome or another password manager
Already have your passwords saved elsewhere. We make it easy to import from just about anywhere. 

➕ Additional features
Secure sharing of passwords, use RoboForm as a TOTP authenticator, get emergency access for a trusted contact, and save and AutoFill any online form. 
🖥️ Install our optional desktop app to get offline access, stay signed in on all installed browsers, support for biometrics like Windows Hello and TouchID, as well as logging in to Windows applications.

⏱️ 24/7 support
We offer chat, phone, and 24/7 email support.
